name: Robobuds
description:
Robobuds by Jacob Lites (programming), Andrew Simpson, and Christian Tuttle (art/design).

A Rapid Prototype Project made by a small team at FIEA in 2017. The goal of this project is to create an advergame that is enjoyable to play and has its advertising as a core, but not a distracting, feature of the gameplay. The product is fictional.

(If the aspect ratio is off, try fullscreen!)

For more information, please visit www.jacoblites.com
